title: "EKKO" Is he real?
body: I don't know about this champ that much, or if it's even real, but I saw a video about it on Youtube, and there was some pretty solid evidence about it. Check it out if anyone wants.

replies.body: hes real they announced today after the game one between skt vs edg
I think we all have seen it, but yeah hes as real as the yorick rework that was announced 2 years ago

More details here on his/her abilities

http://imgur.com/a/TQhlv

Well they a hint with Bard, why not give hint about Ekko? They have never really made 'sound' champions other than Sona and she's songs, tunes and melodies. I'm suspecting him to be a pretty strong mid laner that can either be AD or AP if he is created into a champion.
